appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives U.S. House of Representatives : CSPAN : January 13, 2026 4:31pm-9:30pm EST
appearances.snippet: representative april mcclain delaney called ice lawless.representative alexandria ocasio-cortez called ice, quote, an anti civilian force and they should exist. representative rashida tlaib said ice is, quote, terrorizing our communities and, quote, turning our country into a fascist police state, calling it a rogue agency and calling it for it to be abolished. representative julie johnson excused violence against ice, as people quote, channeling that frustration, representative laura friedman said ice officers are, quote, terrorizing our friends and neighbors and bringing chaos and violence to our streets. i've got dozens more of these that i could continue to fill time on the house floor, going through the absolute vitriolic attacks on the people of ice. literally another 30 in the list that i could read off. that is what is occurring on a daily basis, being directed at the people of ice. now, i want to give you a tale of two choices. i want you to look at and make a decision here about who you want to focus on. over here we have victims
